You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &efr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Efr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D508.
  * `&efr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D522.
